attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in all MPs for covid tyrany.
attributes.additional_details: Eveyone who voted for such things, to step down.
attributes.background: Table a vote of no confidence in all MPs who voted for covid passports and lockdowns as this is tyrany and very unbritish.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
